formalText: They are angry at someone for not enjoying his retirement nor appreciating it.
Their family lost their inheritance and retirement, losing a lot of money.
They can't retire now because of that.
They just feel like since they have been coming here they have become more detached..
They feel like their husband isn't doing anything to. help with house stuff and they have to do everything
They don't want the responsibility of the dog they have.
Sometimes something bubbles up and they just can't stop crying.
Their husband has arthritis all over so he had one knee replaced and the other one needs to be replaced but they probably won't do it.
As they got older with they had an issue with their father wanting to put an arm around them.
They didn't feel comfortable when he did.
Their mother left them in childhood
Their mom couldn't handle having kids.
They refer to people who cut to feel something because they feel and they think there's some of that there because they seem to do more picking when they are more anxious and attached.
